name: test_e2e_with_logs[318_CMD_BACK_005]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `CMD_BACK_005` |
| **Name** | System file modification via backticks |
| **Category** | CMDI |
| **Subcategory** | backtick |
| **Severity** | `CRITICAL` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: ``echo 'hacked' > /etc/motd``
- **Encoded**: `%60echo%20%27hacked%27%20%3E%20%2Fetc%2Fmotd%60`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results

- **Status**: `PASSED`
- **Detection Count**: 1 / 1
- **Latency**: ~44000ms
- **Timestamp**: 11:36:33.000 UTC

## Rule Mapping

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Expected Rule** | `[NGINX SQLi] Encoded SQL Injection Pattern` |
| **Matched Rule** | `[NGINX SQLi] Encoded SQL Injection Pattern test_id=CMD_BACK_005-1772192193132-vic8fi pattern_id=CMD_BACK_005 uri=/?q=%60echo%20%27hacked%27%20%3E%20%2Fetc%2Fmotd%60 client=127.0.0.1 method=GET` |
| **Rule Match** | ✅ Match |

## Detection Evidence

**Rule Name**: [NGINX SQLi] Encoded SQL Injection Pattern test_id=CMD_BACK_005-1772192193132-vic8fi pattern_id=CMD_BACK_005 uri=/?q=%60echo%20%27hacked%27%20%3E%20%2Fetc%2Fmotd%60 client=127.0.0.1 method=GET
